Quotes from game of thrones. Ned: When the day comes, you must take no pleasure in the task, but neither must you look away. A ruler who hides behind paid executioners soon forgets what death is

Catelyn: Every nobles house had its worlds. Family mottoes, touchstones, prayers of sorts, they boasted of honor and glory, promised loyalty and truth, swore faith and courage. All but the Starks. Winter is coming

Tyrion Lannister to Jon Snow
Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armor yourself int it, and it will never be used to hurt you.

Robert Baratheon to Ned Stark
What the king dreams the Hand builts
The king eats, and the Hand takes the shit.

Ned Stark: The only truths I know are here. The south is a nest of adders.

Varys: Lord Eddard, tell me, why is it always the innocents who suffer most, when you high lords play your game of thrones?

Aemon: Love is the bane of honor, death of duty.

*WARNING* POTENTIAL G.O.T. SEASON 1 SPOILER ALERT
If you just strip it down and ignore the story about the white walkers, you could see the plot very simply. it's a book about power and politics
The friend of a king is forced into a tough position, to become his top official at the court.
He is a simple man guided by honor and has no experience in the happenings of the court.
Everyone is whispering to each other, and each trying to advance his/her own motive.
The King dies and can no longer protect his friend. The aide is betrayed by people at court he thought he trusted.
a young kind ascends the throne, and the lords come to arms and start to rebel now.
